column1: #Text=Katara says : " We 'll get in the party , and then find a way to let you in through the side gate . "
#Text=Smellerbee says : " Jet , we need to talk . "
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " We came here to make a fresh start .
#Text=But you wo n't let this go .
#Text=Even though there is no real proof !
#Text=" Jet says : " Well , maybe if you 'd help me !
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " Jet , you got ta stop this .
#Text=" Jet says : " Maybe you 've forgotten why we need to start over .
#Text=Maybe you 've forgotten about how the Fire Nation left us all homeless .
#Text=How they wiped out all the people we loved .
#Text=If you do n't want to help me , I 'll get the evidence on my own .
